headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Triple Rewards on Casino Missions and Rumors of Diamonds in the Vault
content:
Trading in your cash for chips is one way to try and get rich off a casinoâ€™s dime. Another is helping Agatha Baker by completing Casino Missions and assisting the house in running some errands around Los Santos. Ms. Baker is dishing out triple the usual cash and RP on all Casino Missions until April 28th.

If you would rather get your hands dirty: multiple walkie-talkies inside The Diamond have been chirping about a potential delivery of diamonds being made to the vault sometime this week.
